ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Suggestions for a Level 30
ygData.msgSnippet: A lot of people think that SS should trade straight up for the corresponding armor piece for their class. They ignore the fact that SS comes into the world at
ygData.messageBody:
A lot of people think that SS should trade straight up for the corresponding armor piece for their class.
They ignore the fact that SS comes into the world at about the same rate as their armor does, and that
there are a lot fewer high-level Bards. On the other hand, there are a LOT of Bard twinks with money to
throw around, which screws things up. My friend sold SS arms just this last weekend for 5kpp. Luckily
for me, I'm in a guild which just hands stuff around if another guild member needs it, so I have 4 pieces
without ever having seen one drop. I think if you're patient, you'll find someone who's having trouble
dumping the stuff.

I'm using a Lizardscale Cloak myself. I was wondering the same thing.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 54 songs, Innoruuk

PS - Apologies to the foreigners and digest folks for my last message, I forgot to delete all the stuff at
the bottom.

"Cyr, Thierry" wrote:

> That is somewhat true... Lotsa SS out there, lots of it belongs to warriors
> and stuff that think cobalt is an even trade for (haha right!) So i keep to
> myself quiet... Got free ss boots a while back from a friend. Got a free SS
> helm other night from some friends who just came out of seb. And 2 nights
> ago i get a few people asking me about bards in guildchat, one was asking me
> what i was using because he wanted to "twink" his level 30 bard (ok at least
> its not a lev 4). And then a good buddie sends me a tell right afterwards
> asking me if i had my ss gloves, i told him thats why im hunting in karnors
> at 41. Soooo next time i see his chanter i get a free set of ss gloves.
>
> Another question: what are people using as a cloak? (other then cloak of
> flames)
> I got a kunzar cloak last night (hey i was using bronze) and was wondering
> if i should ask my buddy to trade me his lizzie cloak, or should i try to
> buy a better cloak, if so which?
>
> Minkin
> Sol Ro
